isis.stitle: EC-17 ANTILOCK TRACTION CONTROLLER - ANTILOCK AND TRACTION SYSTEM OPERATION DURING COMPONENT FAILURE - MULTIPLE FAILURES

svcproc.title: MULTIPLE FAILURES
svcproc.para: In the event that multiple failures occur, the dash lamp will react as it normally would during a single failure, and the EC-17 equipped with LEDs will show one fault at a time. When the first fault is fixed and the system is reset, the next fault area will appear at the LEDs. This way, the driver or mechanic does not lose track of fault areas, and the system is not restored until each and every error is corrected and the EC-17 is cleared of all faults.
